S0001: Ba mhaith liom labhairt Gaeilge leat anois.
I want to speak Irish with you now.
S0003: conas labhairt chomh minic agus is féidir.
how to speak as often as possible.
S0004: conas rud éigin a rá i nGaeilge
how to say something in Irish
S0005: Táim chun cleachtadh a dhéanamh ag labhairt le duine eile.
I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
S0006: Táim ag iarraidh focal a mheabhrú.
I'm trying to remember a word.
S0007: Ba mhaith liom iarraidh chomh crua agus is féidir liom inniu.
I want to try as hard as I can today.
S0008: Táim chun iarraidh a mhíniú cad atá i gceist agam.
I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
S0009: I speak a little Irish now.
S0010: Níl mé cinnte an féidir liom an abairt iomlán a mheabhrú.
I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
S0011: Ba mhaith liom a bheith in ann labhairt tar éis duit críochnú.
I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
S0012: Ní mhaith liom buille faoi thuairim a thabhairt cad a bheidh ag tarlú amárach.
I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
S0014: An labhraíonn tú Gaeilge ar feadh an lae?
Do you speak Irish all day?
S0015: Agus ba mhaith liom go labhródh tú Gaeilge liom amárach.
And I want you to speak Irish with me tomorrow.
S0016: Ba mhaith leis teacht ar ais le gach duine eile níos déanaí.
He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
S0017: Ba mhaith léi fáil amach cad é an freagra.
She wants to find out what the answer is.
S0018: Ba mhaith linn bualadh le chéile ar a sé a chlog tráthnóna.
We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
S0019: Ach ní mhaith liom stopadh ag caint.
But I don't want to stop talking.
S0020: Ba mhaith leat a ainm a fhoghlaim go tapa.
You want to learn his name quickly.
S0021: Cén fáth a bhfuil tú ag foghlaim a hainm?
Why are you learning her name?
S0022: Toisc ba mhaith liom bualadh le daoine a labhraíonn Gaeilge.
Because I want to meet people who speak Irish.
S0023: Táim chun tosú ag caint níos mó go luath.
I'm going to start talking more soon.
S0024: Níl mé chun a bheith in ann meabhrú go héasca.
I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
S0025: An bhfuil tú chun cabhrú liom sula mbeidh orm imeacht?
Are you going to help me before I have to go?
S0026: Is maith liom mothú amhail is go bhfuil mé beagnach réidh le himeacht.
I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
S0027: Ní maith liom an iomarca ama a thógáil le freagairt.
I don't like taking too much time to answer.
S0028: Tá sé úsáideach tosú ag caint chomh luath agus is féidir leat.
It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
S0029: Táim ag tnúth le labhairt níos fearr chomh luath agus is féidir liom.
I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
S0030: Bhí mé ag iarraidh rud éigin a fhiafraí díot inné.
I wanted to ask you something yesterday.
